pr_title: Add support for Device Id and bump Sync/OS to latest version

timeline.message: Bump to Sync 10.0.0-alpha.14 and latest Object Store. Add support for DeviceId.
Add test for device ID + migrate to using proper model lists in schemas

timeline.bodyText: I used the description from here: https://docs.mongodb.com/stitch/users/user-activity/
timeline.author: cmelchior
timeline.diffHunk:
